quote: I said kiss me again.” A sultry smile curved her lips. “Would that be such a difficult task to perform?”Christ almighty, she wanted him to kiss her again. And she was ordering him to do so.
quote_letters: I SAID KISS ME AGAIN A SULTRY SMILE CURVED HER LIPS WOULD THAT BE SUCH A DIFFICULT TASK TO PERFORMCHRIST ALMIGHTY SHE WANTED HIM TO KISS HER AGAIN AND SHE WAS ORDERING HIM TO DO SO
